title: Resolution Problem (I know this sounds stupid)
body:
Okay, so I have played League for over 2 years with this same monitor. Recently my PC had BSOD. Had to get a new Hard drive. I've re-installed windows. I've used this same monitor before and haven't had a problem but now it seems the screen is zoomed in.

http://imgur.com/a/i8YmF



It's normally not like this. I've tried everything can't get it to not be like this

It's a 1280 x 1024 monitor. I swear it doens't look right.

replies.body:
Given the context you've provided, you may have a missing or improper Display Driver installed, causing things to look really wonky. Generally, after you reinstall an OS, you'll want to update all your drivers to make sure everything works correctly. I recommend you either grab drivers off your PC manufacturer's site, or by using [this guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1)

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
Does this look normal to you guys? I feel like my graphics card isn't working properly or something.
